Todo List

Member Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::calculateJacobian (Vector< double >)
This method is only implemented for multilayer perceptrons with one hidden layer. An extension of this algorithm so as to consider any number of hidden layers must be implemented.

Member Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::calculateSensitivityTest (Vector< double >)
The calculus of the sensitivity matrix is only implemented using numerical differentiation. A back-propagation algorithm for that derivatives should be developed.

Member Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::saveExpression (char *)
This method is not fully implemented.

Member Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::calculateJacobian (Vector< double > input, BoundaryConditionsType &boundaryConditions)
this method is implemented only for one input and one or two output variables. An extension of the algorithm to consider any number of inputs and outputs is required.

Class Flood::RegularizedMinkowskiError
This class is actually implementing a regularized mean squared error. Changing the mean squared error by a Minkowski one is required.

Member Flood::SumSquaredError::calculateJacobian (void)
This method is not fully implemented, and it should be finished.
